name: Gas Meter Removal Incentive
description: $2,500 incentive for fully electrifying your home with confirmation of gas meter removal
fullDescription: City of Palo Alto Utilities rewards residents who fully electrify their homes and disconnect from natural gas service, supporting the city's sustainability goals.
whatTheyOffer:
- $2,500 incentive for gas meter removal
- Rewards full home electrification
- Stacks with other electrification rebates
- Eliminates gas service charges
- Zero-emission home achievement
- Supports city climate goals
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto Utilities customer
2. Replace all gas appliances with electric
3. Request gas meter disconnection from CPAU
4. Confirm gas meter has been removed
5. Submit documentation of electrification
6. Receive incentive after verification
keywords: Palo Alto, CPAU, gas meter removal, $2500, all-electric, full electrification, zero gas, disconnect gas
